Key Match Events: Michael Siani hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the 12th inning
Paul Goldschmidt hit a home run in the 1st, 3rd, and 4th innings
Others: Steven Matz pitched 4.2 innings for the Cardinals, allowing 3 earned runs and striking out 7
Aaron Civale pitched 5.0 innings for the Brewers, allowing 6 hits and 3 earned runs
